content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were walking at burning man near 2'oclock and d, we were about walk back to our camp when we both noticed a very bright light we thought was a star at first but then got progressively larger in a few seconds time.  he then pointed at it with a laser and it powered out straight into space in a matter of seconds.  it was my b-day and 3am was when i was born so i was absolutely excited to have been blessed by that sighting.
content.summary: Burning man ufos (one of many) - star like diamond shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio ona beautifly clear day, when i noticed some high flying birds. as iwas watching the birds i noticed off in the distance a star like object but it was broad daylight. as i watched it had a very peculiar movement pattern. so i rushed inside to grab my video camera. i filmed the object for close to five minuets before i lost sight of the object, witch was moving in a general north to south direction. this is the second day in a row to see the same object and i did capture it both days on video..I know that it was not a plane, or bird, or balloon, or helicopter, the only thing i could speculate was that it was a sattelite..The video is very shakey, but when it is paused one can make out the object to a certin degree..I do not know how to up load the video.But i sure wish that some one could take a look at it because i am curious as to what it might be!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright rectangular shape..Like a wrist watch, bright reflectiveand round in the middle darkrectangular on top and bottom..

content.detailedDescription: A red light with no other lights moving east to west.  being a red light without any other lights i grabbed my camera from my car and tried to take a picture but the object disappeared as soon as i got my camera ready.  it was a red light traveling slowly and pulsating somewhat that flew in a straight line.
content.summary: Bright red light moving westward towards lake champlain

content.detailedDescription: My fiancee and i were at the broncos vs. seahawks game at mile high stadium. we went to the balcony area on the 5th level and looked out over denver. a bright light dropped from the sky and hoovered over the city. there was no pulsation of light or color, nor sound. the object went from a stand still to an immidiate crossing over the entire down town area. the object dropped 90 degrees downward and then zig zaged its way up to cloud level. the bright object disappeared behind the rest of the stadium. my fiancee caught the object coming back through the clouds in the opposite direction faster then anything she had witnissed before. the object jet off and disappeared in a matter of less then a second into the sky above.
content.summary: Bright light traveling incredibly fast and changing direction several times

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of 10/22/82 7:30 a.M. i awoke to a real sighting of an unknown object which was over my floor in front of my bed to the left.  it was aprox. 10"w x 18"h cyclinder shaped, rotating its mass of small round, different sized shapes at an extremely fast speed in a clock wise direction, colored in blues and greens, creating a loud humming sound.  this was a starting experience to come in contact with while i was awake and watching it from my bed in total amazement.  i almost could not believe this was happening, before my very eyes and ears.  i was looking at something that was spinning with centrifugal force that i could not explain.  after viewing it for some time i gave myself a reality check and pinched myself.  after i realized it was real, beautiful and bizzare i did not know what it was there for or what to do so i walked along the right wall into the next room, the bathroom and i could still hear the humming loud sound it was making so i came out went into bed and watched some more untill it dissapeared.  it did not scare me and it left me with tranquillity and joy.  i actually believed immediately afterwards it came to heal me. aprox. 5 years later i was in a health food store and picked up a book called metaphysical meditations and by coincidence the first page i came to was page 35 titled "tune in with the cosmic sound" and read about aum for the  first time in my life.  then i realized what i saw was the cosmic force of  the universe creating the aum sound which attuned my brain wave activity;  which allowed me to feel hope, security, love, and a connection to god which i still have today.
content.summary: Mass of blu-green small varied size atom shapes rotating very fast making loud humming sound.

content.detailedDescription:
The pulsating lights i saw from escondido so, i estimate they dropped down directly over valley center, southern ca. my girl pointed out the blue one 1st and we thought it was a star for 3 minutes. then the pulsating became more prevalent as it got closer. the blue would flash a beautifully piercing laser pen blue color for a second, go dim for a second, and then would stay a medium brightness for about 8 to 10 seconds before flashing brightly again.
this was basically the size of a very bright medium sized star. then we realized what we thought was a star under it was actually another of the exact same pulsating light, but a beautiful green color. like a green laser light. so now 5 minutes into this these 2 lights slowly rotated in a circle so the green was on top and blue on bottom, to blue back on top again. the full rotation took 5 min. then did a slight slow couple zig-zags while staying the same distance from each other .
now more than 10 minutes through this they are very bright pulsating and look like about the distance of a high up plane not to far northward from us.This is as far as they drop down and both move directly east until they disappear out of view which takes about another 7 minutes.These were definitely beautiful lights that 3 of us had never seen before. it is also possible that the lights were connected if that were so it would have been massive but i am leaning more towards they were separate.

(i wrote this immediately after we witnessed the event.  i have seen a couple more ufo's but this one was the most amazing and beautiful) the date is estimated. i know it was a wednesday in may.
content.summary: 2 pulsating lights (laser pen brilliance)

content.detailedDescription: While driving home early in the evening, we pulled into the parking lot of a shopping center when i immediately spotted four bright orange objects in the sky that were out of place in the area. the sky was slightly overcast with a crescent moon visible.  once we pulled into a parking space, i got out of my vehicle for a better look and observed four very bright objects (more luminous than any planet or star in the night sky but not as bright as the moon) moving across the sky from west to east. they appeared from behind trees along the western horizon and moved at a relative speed comparable to a high altitude commercial jetliner.  each light glowed with an orange tinge and, while in close proximity to each other, moved independently, with no observable structure linking them together.  there was no direction change and as they appeared directly overhead, they all "fizzled" out at different times.  another witness in a darker area than us stated she could see individual structures around each light which she would compare to helicopters, but absolutely no noise was heard by anybody. i observed after their disappearance ambient glowing from each object for another several minutes before they totally disappeared, which led me to believe they may have been flares suspended from balloons but i cannot be sure.
content.summary: Bright starlight objects arc across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting occurred in south eastern ky around 1976-1977. my sister and i had went down the hill to go to the out house. i was waiting outside for her when i spotted the large plane like object.It came into view over top of the  mountain,moving at a very slow speed. i sat there watching it amazed at its size and lack of sound. i remember a drowning sound kind of like a wind, but not the sound that you would think would be associated with the large craft(as i often watched planes fly over the mountain tops at night, i  knew that the  object that i was seeing was very large indeed and like nothing i"d ever seen come over that mountain before). the ship looked the size of my hand, yet the object was not low flying; it seemed to be flying at least at the same altitude that the larger jets would.
 it was in view several minutes before i got my sister to come outside to check out what was going on. i wanted someone else to see this too. several minutes after she was outside, the first of the smaller ships zoomed into view. 
 several smaller ships came into view at a much higher speed than the larger one had done.The smaller ships came to the front of the larger ship,and went into formation around it (about three ships?), and then slowed down to match the speed of the larger ship.
 when the larger ship flew into view, it was moving in an straight line. then it slowly changed its direction by flying in a wide arch pattern (like a "c" ), before going on a straight course again toward wendover. note: if you could look at a topographical map and draw a line from flacky creek,to lick branch hollow, that would be the direction of the first part of the flight pattern, then the ship arched its flight toward hyden, then turned like a car in a curve to head back up lick branch hollow and eventually over the mountain top toward wendover, and eventually flew out of view in this direction heading toward pin mountain.
 when the large ship was making the change in direction, by starting to fly into the arch, my sister and i went running to the house to get our parents and others from the house. by the time they were outside other ships had came into view. there were two distinct colors of lights on the smaller ships. one set matched the lighting on the larger ship in tones of red. the other set were odd blues to blue-green in color. the red lighted crafts were in formation around the front, back, and sides of the larger ship, there were other smaller groupings of the small craft farther out from tip sides and back of the ship. it looked as if they were flanking the large ships. as the blue lighted crafts came into view the red lighted craft would break away from the formation and pursue them. there would be flashes of light, as if various ships were shooting , and as if the other ships were then hit. but, we never heard explosions, and we never saw debris falling. some of the craft would fly away over the mountains in pursuit of other craft. they could switch direction so fast it was amazing to watch. they could bank, and drop, than seamlessly raise back to a higher altitude. we watched this for several minutes. at least twenty, then the blue lighted ships were chased out of view, and the red lighted craft came back, went  into formation around the larger ship, slowed to its pace, and drifted off over the mountain top moving toward pine mountain/wendover. 
as odd as this sounds, we thought we were witnessing the start of world war three. we had never seen anything like it. we were terrified. the smaller craft looked very similar in shape to some of the jets that you see in military operations on tv now. except these things could move so fast, and fly in such odd ways. then there was the larger craft, exactly in shape like the smaller craft, but it had to have been enormous, you could have parked all the smaller craft on top of it and still had room left over. 
my dad had a friend who had flown in world war two,  and he used to fly over our house and put on a dare devil flight show for us. we would also go to the hazard airport to watch him fly from there. i was used to seeing what small jets, and planes, looked like in the sky and on the ground. 
i guess that is why i was so into watching the planes as they flew over the mountains. i was amazed at how small they looked high in the sky. that is how i can tell you that this ship was very big indeed.  this was different than anything i'd ever seen. the whole thing lasted about twenty to twenty five minutes. after it was over, we went inside and waited for the 11:00 news to come on. we were sure that we would hear about impending attacks and war being waged against the usa. we sat up most of the night listening to the radio, and even listened the next day. to our amazement no one was saying anything.  we never figured out what it was that we witnessed that night in the sky. i'd love an answer if you can shed light on what it was that we saw happen.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Many in sky;all triangular; two distinct light colors(groups), largest ship flying very slow; smaller ships could move like a flash

content.detailedDescription:
I was spending the night (a friday night) to meet up with another friend the next day to go on a field trip by bus to chicago.  

my friends parents were having a card party, and she and i were sitting in her parents car in the driveway, listening to music and looking at the stars and talking about ufos.  after a short while, i noticed an odd bright light in the sky, and jokingly told my friend that, "...And there's one now..."  we both got out of the car and started waving our arms saying goofy kid stuff like "come on down", etc. and laughing.

to our surprize, the object we saw simply 'dropped' from it's very high location to a much lower one.  it was at this time that i could clearly see what appeared to me to be a large circle of round individual lights.  we stopped goofing around, and were totally stunned by what we saw, then the object shot up, sort of zig-zagged, and sped away (north) in a blink.

we both ran into the house, but of course, the adults just laughed off what we were saying.  we did not go outside to check anything again, as we were truly shocked and a little frightened by our experience.

my friend's cat acted very strangely the rest of the evening - sort of moaning and meowing in a way i've never heard a cat act.  the next morning when we went to meet up with our friend, we were 25 minutes late.  unbeknownst to us, the clock had lost time, which had made us arrive late to our friend's house.

the only really interesting thing about all of this was that i have always been amazed and liked to read stories, etc about ufos, but i never once saw in any picture, story, whatever, what i witnessed that night.  not until 25 years later in january/february 1992 when i was casually watching an episode of unsolved mysteries narrated by robert stack.  it was about ufos, and i was watching it in passing. it was then(and only then), that i saw a supposed picture of a ufo that was 'exactly' what i saw that night in lafayette, indiana...  come to find out, the picture was taken in indiana and it was taken by a policeman.  i have never been able to locate that particular episode of unsolved mysteries, but it is on record, and i definitely know what i saw.

growing up in lafayette, indiana, on occasion, there was air traffic backed up from the chicago airports in our location, but even though this was an odd sight once in awhile, this is 'not' what my friend and i saw in 1967.  it is truly something that has stayed in my mind like it happened yesterday my entire life.

the only other time i have seen (in a movie) something closely resembling what i saw was when the spacecraft took off in et at the very end - it had that same 'circle of lights' that i clearly saw over the cornfield behind the house in lafayette, indiana in 1967.

i am a current federal employee working for a law enforcement agency, and have never witnessed any event other than the one outlined above.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed a 'circle of lights' ufo hover and zig-zag about 200+- feet over a corn field in lafayette, indiana in 1967.

content.detailedDescription:
I returned home from the airport after a trip to johannesburg.  i let my dog out and looked up at the sky.  i noticed what appeared to be two satellites moving across the sky.  i immediately thought it strange that there should be two alongside each other and they didn���t seem to follow the natural satellite path and i have never seen a satellite in the sky in my whole year of living in kwazulu natal, whereas i am used to seeing them regularly when living in johannesburg.
suddenly from two, there seemed to be many satellites all floating across the sky in the same direction.  from where i was standing it would have been from ballito side towards durban north.  at first i couldn���t believe my eyes, it was surreal.  then all sorts of emotions began to flood through me.  i was filled with powerful need to share the experience with others and to check if they could see what i was seeing.  i began frantically calling friends and got no answers.  then, a friend called me back and i was able to describe what i was seeing.  it was absolutely incredible to see so many 'satellites' moving in random formation across the night sky.  i phoned my father in johannesburg and asked him to check if he could see anything moving across the sky using the moon as a reference point. i wanted to know if what i was seeing was visible only in natal or if it was also visible in johannesburg.  neither my dad nor my friend could see anything happening up in johannesburg. 
 at this point i was filled with awe and excitement.  at no time was i afraid, albeit i could see that the sky was a mass of craft.  i kept on thinking that i have had a dream of just such an event and now here it is materialised.  i then, contacted another friend who lives locally and asked her to see if she could see what i was seeing.  she said that she couldn���t and that it was simply the clouds moving across the stars making it appear as though they were moving.  for a little while i was disorientated, and could not actually determine what was moving and what was stationary.  suddenly i began to feel foolish and mistaken.  mostly very dizzy and disorientated.
now that some time has passed i am clear on what i witnessed.  the scudding clouds have cleared up from the night sky and i can see the fixed stars clearly - so at one time, the sky was full of moving stars/satellites and now it's clear with only a few 'fixed stars'.
also as the satellites were moving across the sky some were in groups of three and some seemed to be joined together.  they were too far away to make out the shape.
i have witnessed 4 ufo sightings to date, but this was the most powerful 'statement' i have experienced.  i cannot believe that i am the only one to have experienced or seen this incredible phenomenon.  the message seemed to be; ���we are moving in, you are not alone���.
i went from feeling tired after a long day and two plane journeys, to feeling empowered, invigorated and uplifted.  perhaps i���m a lone ���crazy��� but i���m a very happy crazy!
content.summary: An entire fleet of ufo's moved along the coastline from north to south

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my home to smoke a cigarette at about 10:30 p.M. on september 3rd.  i was facing southeast and in my peripheral vision i noticed something at first i thought was a shooting star.  when i focused my eyes on it i saw it was a v shaped formation of lights moving in the manner of an airplane towards the southeast.  the lights were about the same size, color and brightness as the surrounding stars.  i thought it odd that it made no sound.  i observed it for about 2 seconds before it went out of my sight beyond some trees.  never having seen anything like this before, i have no reference as to the size, height or speed of the object.  i would guess it was some type of aircraft but have never observed a plane that made no sound before. initially i was unnerved by the sighting, but i wonder if it could have been a stealth or some other type of military craft. i would like to know if there's any possibility of a stealth flying over this area?
content.summary: Observed v shaped light formation travelling silently across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Six other people and i saw what at first appeared to be a very bright satellite or landing lights from an aircraft, except it was orange and much brighter than the space station or a iridium flare, which only lasts a second or two. it appeared over some tree tops from the north east, traveled just about straight overhead, and blinked out in the south west sky approximately 35-45 degrees above the sw horizon. 
it traveled at a constant speed, like a satellite or space station, and never wavered. there was no contrail or smoke being emitted. no strobe or nav lights noticed and no sound.
the color is what caught everyone���s attention. it was orange, and when it was overhead it did appear to be ever so lightly changing in intensity, as if it were on fire. it was also obvious it was not an aircraft since at such an angle, and as it continued away from us, the landing lights would not have been so bright or visible at all. 
i doubt if it was a bolide or space junk entering the atmosphere due to its constant speed and other characteristics. i have also witnessed bolides, meteors, satellites and space junk in the past due to one of my favorite pastimes, star gazing, for over 40 years.
content.summary: Bright orange object seen over rockford, il, many witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
Driving along us231.  the clouds looked funny at the time and i observed an oject coming out of the odd looking clouds.  at first i thought it was an airplane until it got close, than it descended very fast which isn't usual for an aircraft, or not that i've ever seen.  that is when i noticed that it was circular in shape and i could see the center was a lazer red light.  it was rocking side to side and didn't like a smooth descent.  it came down into a smalled wooded are which was about 50-6- yard wide with small trees and dense under growth.  i turned onto the road of the wooded area and i didn't observe the object after that.  

at the time as i watched it rocking back and forth i felt like it was  having mechanical problems.
content.summary: Observed circular object coming out of clouds

content.detailedDescription: Witness saw a green light( no tail)with a disk shape traveling downward at a 45 degree angle (nw-se) on sunday morning september 4th, 2011 at 6am. witness entered the kitchen to check the time on the kitchen clock. it was 6am. a glowing, green light was see through the french door shears.  according to the witness, this was the largest flying object (unknown) she had ever seen. there was no sound as the light  (object) disappeared behind a hill to the east. the witness indicated that a softball held at arm���s length just might cover the object.
content.summary: Green light moves from nw to se

content.detailedDescription:
I did not see this when i was taking the pictures of tropical storm lees' clouds as they appeared approaching richmon.I was only taking several photos of some beautiful cloud formations at the rising of the sun.When i got to #87 photo i noticed a spec on the screen of my computer as i was down loading the pictures.It wasn't on the picture before or after.I was only out there in my front yard for a few seconds.When i zoomed in on this spec i was blown away as to what i saw.I saw a flying object high up in the cloud bank tilted over at about 45 degress.The object was red and has something like antennas coming out the top.The object has a concave bottom and has no wings.Whatever it was didn't apparently make any noise as i was unaware of it as i took the photos.But,it must have really been going fast as to appear in only one of the digital frames.This was shot with a sony 14.1 mpx cyber shot camera.I still have the image saved in the memory card if any one wants to down load it on their computer.I don't know of anything in our world that flys and looks like this.I welcome questions or any assistance determining what this was or is.
(name and number removed to field investigator box)cms 09/06/11 14:44 flg
content.summary: A red bell shaped objest that is flared out at the bottom with something on top

content.detailedDescription:
I live in dallas, and was rinsing a cup out in my kitchen sink when i happened to look out the window next to me and see a bright, pulsating light situated on the horizon between my neighbors' roof and a patch of trees.  the light was stationary, but did not appear to be a planet, as the colors frequently changed from yellow gold, to pink, to red and orange.  there may have been two smaller lights flashing at different times, actually.  it was difficult to see exactly what i was looking at given the distance of myself from the object. 

anyway, i observed it for around three minutes with no change aside from it's weird flashing.  i felt no fear, just a kind of awe and confusion over what it was.  in this time, i saw two planes fly by and matched them to both (definitely neither).  after that, i went back to the living room and was on the computer for maybe fifteen minutes, before i decided to check the window again and see if the object was still there.  

when i checked again, it was gone.  i still don't know what to make of it, since i've never observed an object like that that low in the sky and flashing like it did.
content.summary: Stationary, pulsating object observed from kitchen window, before object disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I and my sister were in our mother's apartment in cap d'ail france (06320) which is high and overlooks the sea. we were watching the horizon and saw for 30 seconds a thin white object of about 100 meters long traveling just above the water level without leaving any traces and a few meters far from the boats around. it was heading towards the coast at constant speed and as fast as a helicopter, its trajectory was perfectly linear. this happened on monday september 5th 2011 around 12pm. nothing in the local press yet...




no ufo on the photo this is just the place where it happened

the ufo moved from 10 to 4
content.summary: Straight-line path 10 meters above the sea about 500 meters away from the coast

content.detailedDescription: It was early in the evening, i was sitting on my front porch ,my porch fases south,out of the corner of my eye to the east i saw what i thaught was an airplane coming in for a landing but it was coming in very fast,probably 5 to 600 mph then it slowed very fast to less than probably around a 100 mph,at first i only saw one pulsating whit light,then as it turned to the east i could see that it had pulsating lights on each end of it. i live within 15 miles of a large airport, i see airplanes all the time coming in for landings day and night as my home sits directly under one of the aprouch pathes for the airport {jacksonville international airport },now back to my sighting,after the ufo slowed it turned yo the east and then headed east probably 4 to 500 yards,then to my amasement it swivaled 360 degrees in a circle,my wife saw it too but was headed in the house and didnot see it do the 360 spin,when it did the 360,that startled me and i jumped up and said,{did you see what that thing just did,it just did a 360 deg tirn and cept going},but at the time my wife was headed in the front door of our house and did not see it,after it made the 360 it continude to head east slowly and flew over the tree line and out of sight,i am 49 years old and i have thousands of airplanes in my time and i am telling you, this was no airplane,helicopter,bolloon,blimp,reflection,or any aircraft i have ever seen,also this thing made no noise eccept when it was coming in at high speed,and then all i heard was the sound of air moving out of the way of an object traveling at high speed,but after it slowed i could not hear any noise,after it did the 360 i knew i was looking at some kind of alien spacecraft.After seeing this i truly beleive we are not alone in the universe.The lights on this thing were not flashing like an aiaplanes lights but pulsating and the lights were elongated on each end oval in the middle,i have never seen anything like that before and it kind of makes me nervese,why are they coming here and what do they want?.
content.summary: I saw a ufo decend at a 45 deg angle very fast then slow down very fast and then change derection ,and then spin around 360 degrees and then it flew over the trees and out of sight

content.detailedDescription: It was 8:50pm sunday september 4, 2011. while waiting for a friend i was meeting for dinner, i was looking up at the sky when i saw what i thought to be planes.....But 5 so close together. my first thought was....How can air traffic control be choreographing this cluster. then i recognized the movement........The larger being still......A smaller object moving right slowly....Then fast...Then changing direction. the 3 smallest were close together....Moving up and down right and left.....The medium sized one, at a still moment....Vanished.....The 3 smaller ones vanished one by one....The larger became more brilliant...Like it was ablaze.....Then slowly disappeared. it was a remarkable experience. when my friend finally arrived, he commented that i was glowing and my eyes were sparkling. i had to share the excitement of what i saw. i was actually tingling all over. i waited to see the news the next day.....But nothing. i contacted a friend who led me to this sight. i would love to know what i saw. next step is to learn how to work the video app on my phone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw 5 glowing objects in the sky on sunday september 4 at 8:50pm est

content.detailedDescription:
I was about to go to bed.  i live on the ninth story of my building and went to the window to draw down the blinds when i saw the lights.  my window faces due east.  normally i watch planes come in to land at minneapolis airport.  last night i saw two lights hovering approximately 2 miles distance from my position where no lights had appeared before.  

at first i thought they were planes but they didn't move.  they hovered over the tops of the trees. one of them hovered about 100 feet over the tree top and the other about 200 feet above the tree tops.  there was about 300 feet of space between the two.  

when i first saw them they were two solid white lights then they started flashing red, yellow, green,  and white lights.  i had watched them for about 3 minutes looking for movement when the lowest one winked out of existence.  the five minutes later the 2nd one did the same.
content.summary: Two objects hovering over trees

content.detailedDescription: We were camping on higgins lake michigan, and i was sitting by the campfire with my wife. i always look at the sky, looking for strange things, so i have seen about everything. there were quite a bit of tall trees, but i noticed a bright orange/red light at about 1:oclock in the sky, at around 10pm. i thought it looked odd because of the color, and there were no blinking lights, and it was kinda pulsating a bit. it was raining a bit so there were no stars. my wife and i watched it move north to south, not real fast..But probably faster then an airplane. we could see it very clearly even through the trees. we knew it was not a plane, comet, or shooting star. after it dissapeared i sat staring at the sky in the direction it had came from, when i noticed another of the exact same thing, come in the same direction...Same path. this was about 15 seconds later. we watched this one move north to south until we couldnt see it anymore because of the trees. now i knew we were seeing something weird, when all the sudden about 10-15 seconds later another appeared, same color, size, path...Everything. about an hour or so later, we saw another object...Same everything, then 10-15 seconds later another. after that we didnt see anything else, and i watched the next night...Didnt see anything but a plane...Which we could also hear. i put my sighting on facebook, and within a few minutes a friend said they had seen an orange/red object near davison mi.
content.summary: 5 orange/red lights

content.detailedDescription: On sept 6 2011 i observed a ufo shooting a beam of light at the water tank owned by the city water board on vanderbilt street on the south east side of town this is a large water tank an egg like object came out of the rear of the cylinder object and landed in the fenced in area at the base of the water tank an entity came out greeted another that was already on the ground they both boarded the egg shaped vehicle and zipped back to the cylinder the cylinder instantaniouls.
content.summary: Was shooting a beam of light to the water tank while circling the tank

content.detailedDescription: As i said above i walked outside to smoke and thought i saw a high flying bird like a hawk or vulture. i looked closer as being an avid bird watcher and noticed that this was definitely not a bird. the object was hovering and had a boomerang type shape,and was a grayish black.It seemed that one side out the boomerang shape was long and pointier than the other. after one minute of hovering it began to wobble then started to move to the south over st olaf college. when it was almost directly over st olaf college it made a course change straight north turning on a dime. at this point it had risen well over 2000 to 3000 feet from its original height. it kept moving north toward minneapolis rising in height as it went until i could no longer see it. it seemed to slowly go faster and faster as it rose but the craft stayed level, not like a plane where the nose goes up if you go up. i live right under a flight path for the minneapolis airport and not 15 seconds after i saw this i saw an airplane fly over maybe they saw more than i did. i believe it was a md-80 commercial airline possibly delta.
content.summary: Walked outside to smoke a cigarette looked up and a thought i saw a high flying bird but then i noticed it was a craft of some sort

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in backyard when a glimmer in the sky caught my eye. at first i thought it was merely sunlight glinting off an airplane. but as i watched i noticed that the craft was not following a directional path like an airplane. the object was bobbing and meandering, turning left and right and up and down. i watched more and saw that the object was actually emitting flashing white lights from either underneath or all around the bottom edge.  the flashing light pattern would change from rapid flash to slow pulse. it disappeared in some clouds. i watched further to see it again and it reappeared a moment later continuing its same behavior. at this time i called to my friend in the house to come out and see. we watched together for about twenty seconds. it disappeared and came back again for another minute before disappearing for good.
content.summary: Small disc or cigar shaped. flew in a meandering path in all directions. flashing light bar.

content.detailedDescription: Going south on power road towards us 60 i made a right hand turn to merge onto the us 60 going east. as i entered the on ramp and looked up and to the east i noticed what appeared to be an airplane making a landing approach in my direction. it was basically in front of me and to slightly to the right. as i drove down the on-ramp, i rolled my window down and looked out my passenger window and the object was not very far above may car as it made a very slow turn and i could not hear a thing. i turned the radio off as i was looking at the object and rolled the window down and the object never made a noise. i quicly drove to sossaman the next intersection and you cannot go "right on red" so i had to sit there for a moment and when i found that object again it was considerably further to the south.
content.summary: Moved extremely slow with no noise. slowly turned to the south.

content.detailedDescription: Went out on deck to have cigarette, just looking around, saw red and blue lights over the trees. it was just hanging there, could see it looked circular and had 4-5 lights.  was a dark gray color. it sat there for a minute or two and a bright blue and white beam came down in the middle of it and it just disappeared, no sound. never say anything like it.
content.summary: Circular craft over tree tops, had red and blue lights

content.detailedDescription: Just walk out side n look at the starts n they started to move on 1 line n go 1 direction no sound n to high to be us army planes with n blinking lights no sound just nun it was about 9.15 pm n chicago
content.summary: Look like an triangle its was abt 20 of them just floating

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting around a campfire about 15-20 minutes after sunset. the sky was not yet dark enough to see stars. my wife suddenly said "what is that?" and pointed south. we witnessed a large string of lights (about 12-15 of them perhaps, very close together) moving west to east at less than 50 mph (a car moving on a highway is faster). it looked to be 3 miles away and was pretty large very low to the horizon. we estimated 1000-2000 feet up. we each estimated the string 200 feet long. the string of lights were so close together my wife thought of them as a light bar. i could see them as very close lights. after we watched for a couple of minutes i asked my wife to get a pair of binoculars in the house. i stared at the lights for at least 2 minutes while she was gone. i seemed to detect some surface above and below the lights i would call dull gray. once she returned we noticed the lights turned towards the south, south east. not straight south. the string of lights shrank to a point source after the turn. i eventualy looked through the binoculars and could see brighter light on the left and dimmer on the right. i assumed the string of lights was on each side and when it was traveling sse and i could see more of the left side than the right hence the brighter left side light point than the right. the width of the lights now 1/4th the size of the length. (about 50 feet) i watched the entire 6 minutes and we lost interest as the "craft" moved farther away at slow speed. later that evening we saw comercial airliners flying high overhead, we could easily see green, red and the strobe lights. we could hear them also. the craft we saw moved less than 1/4th as fast of a commercial airliner (commercial airliners at altitudes of at least 35,000 feet) and appeared 4 times bigger. there is also a cell tower east of this sighting that we can easily see the blinking red light on top. we each commented several times that there were no other colored lights on the craft but bright white. there were no strobes. we saw several airliners over the next 3 evenings while around campfires and never as low as this craft and never as slow. my wife also saw a meteor the night before the sighting that streaked west to east and lastest 10-15 seconds. what we saw was not a meteor, commercial airliner or satellite and we saw several airliners over the 4 nights we sat around campfires. i would describe this craft as a very large blimp with only a long string of floodlights down it's center. no visible cabin, control surfaces or rudder. can't imagine why a blimp would be flying across the prairie after dusk with about 15 flood lights on it's side and no strobe or red/green lights. we could see the left side and back of the craft.
content.summary: String of lights, about 12 to 15. wife described the sighting as light bar. moved west to east for 3 minutes then turned to sse and moved off over then next 3 minutes. we stopped watching.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my sons bedroom just admiring the nice eveining when i happened to nice the objects.  first sighting ever......2 orange, glowing orbs, raced around in and out of the clouds at about 1500ft.  they moved as fast as a passenger jet but changed direction very quickly.  they disappeared for about 30 seconds and then reappeared for less than 1 minute and repeated the same behavior.  i felt i was witnessing intelligent live as these orbs seemed to "play' with each other as they darted in and out of the clouds.
content.summary: Witnessed 2 orange orbs flying quicly and errartically over ottawa, canada

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking a friend to his car outside my house, we were looking up at the sky because we thought we'd heard rain just before. the sky was overcast and cloudy, but we saw a group of different sized, whitish orbs in the sky & became captivated. they were rapidly moving, in a clockwise circular direction. some were larger than others,& occasionally one would break formation, then return to the circle. at times it appeared 2 were traveling together, but not always.

after my friend left, i continued to go outside to look at their continued action. i called a local tv station, to inquire as to whether they'd had any reports and they said they hadn't.

we ruled out a beacon or other lights used in sales promotions, it simply wasn't like that. i finally had to come back inside and go to bed. again it is overcast this evening, with the expectation of rain, so i suspect i won't be seeing them tonight. last night i estimate we'd watched them from about 11:30 to midnight, then i continued to go outside until after 12:30.

it is inconceivable to me that there were no other witnesses to this spectacle, and i would love to know if someone else saw this.

thank you!
content.summary: Amazing, round spheres going in circular pattern clockwise, don't know when it started or ended; we watched an hour.
